pullRequest.title: motherlode: Add overlay for broken water wheel struts
pullRequest.bodyText:
When strut is broken, red border with hammer icon will show around it.
closes #2018

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            public class MotherlodeBrokenStrutOverlay extends Overlay
          
          
            
            class MotherlodeBrokenStrutOverlay extends Overlay
This can't be null when overlays are rendering.
I'm not sure if this really happens or not, but if it does, it isn't correct as it would not remove the rocks whenever they change into something else.

nodes.bodyText:
gameObject is only used once now. Change this to
addGameObject(event.getGameObject());
You could probably just rename the RocksOverlay to MotherlodeSceneOverlay and then put this in there aswell since it looks very similar.
